Books

Reading is one of the things I love. Here are my thoughts on the books that have been in my bag or on my kindle.

Michel Faber

Under the Skin

Having come to this after seeing the film, the novel is a completely different beast. Altogether much darker and much funnier, Under the Skin is a great tale of an alien view looking in on humanity and all itâ€™s flaws. Featuring an alien who must kidnap men, it is through these men that her own notions of humanity and compassion are challenged. A fascinating journey of a book that is nothing like you will expect. A definite must read.
